1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Brian,
I hope you are also well, thank you for reaching out. MBO is actually not a payroll company, but a consulting services firm that allows independent consultants to work under our corporate structure and manage their back office support through our systems. We do not sponsor H-1B visas because we lack control over the workers that is required when sponsoring a candidate because our consultants find their own work and we do not manage their hours, pay etc. I don’t usually work with any payroll companies so I don’t know anyone off the top of my head but if I come across someone I would be happy to pass the information along to you.
Please let me know if you have any additional questions.
Thank you, Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
